title: InventoryAdviceFull
description: This schema is used to set inventory counts on merchant skus

fulfillment_node_id.description: Jet's unique ID for a given fulfillment node

alt_fulfillment_node_id.description: The fulfillment node id that the merchant assigns to a facility

jet_sku.description: Jet's unique identifier for an product

merchant_sku.description: Merchants unique identifier for an product

quantity.description: The quantity of the mechant sku avaiable

availability_date.description:
The date that the inventory becomes available to send

                    #Valid Values

                    The UTC time as follows 'yyyy'-'MM'-'dd'T'HH':'mm':'ss'.'fffffff''Z' for example 5PM eastern daylight time on Jan 1st 2015 would be '2015-01-01T21:00:00.0000000Z'

lead_time.description: The number of days that the product takes to fulfill.  This value will be considered with the fulfilltime time of the corresponding fulfillment node
